parse.title: List of avalanches by death toll

text.*:
This is an incomplete list of notable avalanches.

Death toll (estimate) Event Location Date
1 7004220000000000000♠22,000 Huascarán avalanche; triggered by the 1970 Ancash earthquake[1] Peru 1970
2 7004100000000000000♠10,000 White Friday (1916)[2] Italy 1916
3 7003400000000000000♠4,000 Huascarán avalanche[1] Peru 1962
4 7002310000000000000♠310 2015 Afghanistan avalanches Afghanistan 2015
5 7002265000000000000♠265 Winter of Terror; series of 649 avalanches Austria-Switzerland 1951
6 7002201000000000000♠201 (56 confirmed, 145 presumed dead) 2012 Afghanistan avalanches[3] Afghanistan 2012
7 7002200000000000000♠200 Lahaul Valley avalanche[4] India 1979
8 7002172000000000000♠172 2010 Salang avalanches; series of at least 36 avalanches Afghanistan 2010
9 7002155000000000000♠155 1918 Mitsumata village avalanche[5] Japan 1918
10 7002138000000000000♠138 2012 Gayari Sector avalanche Pakistan 2012
11 7002125000000000000♠125 Kolka-Karmadon rock ice slide Russia 2002
12 7002107000000000000♠107 Saint-Martin[6] (Hautes-Pyrénées) France 1600
13 7002102000000000000♠102 2010 Kohistan avalanche Pakistan 2010
14 7001960000000000000♠96 Wellington, Washington avalanche; deadliest avalanche in the United States United States 1910
15 7001900000000000000♠90 1922 Ōmi Train avalanche[7] Japan 1922
16 7001840000000000000♠84 1938 Unazuki avalanche[8] Japan 1938
17 7001810000000000000♠81 Pragelato Italy 1904
18 79 (7001570000000000000♠57 confirmed 22 presumed dead) 1954 Blons avalanches Austria 1954
19 7001700000000000000♠70 Frassino avalanche Italy 1885
20 7001650000000000000♠65 Palm Sunday Avalanche; deadliest avalanche along Chilkoot Trail Alaska 1898
21 7001620000000000000♠62 1910 Rogers Pass avalanche; deadliest avalanche in Canada Canada 1910
22 7001590000000000000♠59 1993 Bayburt Üzengili avalanche Turkey 1993
23 7001550000000000000♠55 Møre og Romsdal Norway 1679
24 7001500000000000000♠50[citation needed] Siglunesi Iceland 1613
25 7001430000000000000♠43 Lenin Peak[9] Kyrgyzstan 1990
2014 Nepal snowstorm disaster Nepal October 2014
27 7001420000000000000♠42 1995 Gokyo avalanche[10] Nepal 1995
28 7001400000000000000♠40 Puente del Inca avalanche[11] Argentina 1965
29 7001390000000000000♠39 Val-d'Isère[12] France 1970
30 7001380000000000000♠38 Huez-en-Oisans[13] France 1749
31 7001370000000000000♠37 Ortiporio (Corsica) France 1934
32 7001320000000000000♠32 Vallouise (Hautes-Alpes) France 1757
33 7001310000000000000♠31 1999 Galtür avalanche Austria 1999
34 7001290000000000000♠29 Rigopiano avalanche Italy 2017
35 7001280000000000000♠28 Granduc Mine Avalanche[14] Canada 1965
36 7001240000000000000♠24 Seyðisfjörður Iceland 1885
2017 Gurez sector avalanche India 2017
38 7001230000000000000♠23 Balea Lac Romania 1977
39 7001220000000000000♠22 2015 Mount Everest avalanches; triggered by the April 2015 Nepal earthquake[15][16] Nepal April 2015
40 7001210000000000000♠21 Sogn og Fjordane Norway 1873
Lofoten Norway 1956
42 7001200000000000000♠20 Hnífsdalur Iceland 1910
Flateyri Iceland 1995
44 7001180000000000000♠18 Rybô[citation needed] Slovakia 1924
45 7001160000000000000♠16 Low Tatras[17] Slovakia 1956
Vassdall Norway 1986
2014 Mount Everest avalanche Nepal April 2014
48 7001150000000000000♠15 1972 Manaslu Nepal avalanche Nepal 1972
49 7001140000000000000♠14 Súðavík Iceland 1995
50 7001120000000000000♠12 Neskaupstaður Iceland 1974
High Tatras[18] Slovakia 1974
Montroc avalanche[19] France 1999
Kaprun avalanche Austria 2000
54 7001110000000000000♠11 Flathead Valley avalanches Canada 2008
2009 Zigana avalanche Turkey 2009
Manaslu[20] Nepal 2012
57 7001100000000000000♠10 2009 Afghan avalanches Afghanistan 2009
58 7000900000000000000♠9 Seyðisfjörður Iceland 1732
Siglufjörður Iceland 1919
Cerro ventana avalanche[21] Argentina 2002
Mont Maudit avalanche[22] France 2012
Restelica Kosovo 2012
63 7000800000000000000♠8 Lewes avalanche; deadliest avalanche in the United Kingdom United Kingdom 1836
64 7000700000000000000♠7 Alpine Meadows United States March 1983
Sankt Anton am Arlberg (Wolfsgruben avalanche) Austria 1988
2003 Connaught Creek Valley avalanche British Columbia 2003
Western Tatras Slovakia 2005
68 7000600000000000000♠6 Oravska Magura Slovakia 1968
1970 Mount Everest disaster Nepal 1970
2009 Schalfkogel avalanche Austria 2009
Valfréjus avalanche France January 2016
72 7000500000000000000♠5 Loveland Pass avalanche[23] United States 2013
2016 Geier avalanche Austria February 2016
74 7000300000000000000♠3 1996 Mount Everest disaster[24] Nepal 1996
2009 Buachaille Etive Mòr avalanche United Kingdom 2009
2012 Tunnel Creek avalanche United States 2012
